attributes.action: Change the benefit rules so that the amount of benefit ANY family/single parent can receive is equivalent to earning the MINIMUM WAGE for 37 hours per wk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are so many families who are caught in the "benefit trap" who claim that they would be worse off if they went to work....change the benefit rules so that what they would get is EQUAL to what a person would receive if they worked 37 hours per wk on the MINIMUM WAGE...a wage set by government.NO EXCUSES THEN TO GET EMPLOYMENT and they would be in the same position as MANY HARDWORKING PEOPLE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
